attributes.action: free childcare for all 2 year olds
attributes.additional_details:
This e petition is to call for free early education for all 2 year olds throught the UK.
Every morning i have a battle with my two year old as she watches her friends go to pre school and she can't for the simple fact funding isn't available to us, being a single income family who earns above the £16000 limit and also dosent qualify for the childcare element of tax credits with a family to look after it is simply impossible to afford over £200 a month so our child can receive receive the same education as non working families and those who's earnings are below £16000 a year.
This to me is outrageous the  same education should be available to all children no matter what there parents financial circumstances may be!
I know how much being able to go to school would mean to my daughter and im positive many parents out there feel the same way so lets stand together, shout until we are heard and accept nothing less than what our children deserve
